hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EOSP.EOSP_ID, EOSP.CREATOR, EOSP.CREATE_TIME, EOSP.MODIFIER, EOSP.MODIFY_TIME, EOSP.REC_VER, EOSP.REC_STATUS, EOSP.ORG_ID, EOSP.EOSP_CODE, EOSP.EOSP_NAME, EOSP.EOSP_NAME_EN, EOSP.EOSP_CUSTOMER_CODE, EOSP.EOSP_CUSTOMER_NAME, EOSP.EOSP_ORDER_TYPE_CODE, EOSP.EOSP_ORDER_TYPE_NAME, EOSP.EOSP_PRIORITY, EOSP.EOSP_REMARK, EOSP.EOSP_FOR_SPLIT_TIMER, EOSP.EOSP_RETAIN_ORIGINAL_ORDER, EOSP.EOSP_RETAIN_ATTACHMENT, EOSP.EOSP_RETAIN_EXTENSION, EOSP.EOSP_RETAIN_FEE, EOSP.EOSP_RETAIN_REMARK from EO_ORDER_SPLIT_PARAM EOSP where 1=1 and ((EOSP.EOSP_CUSTOMER_CODE =:customer and EOSP.EOSP_ORDER_TYPE_CODE =:type) or ((EOSP.EOSP_CUSTOMER_CODE is null or EOSP.EOSP_CUSTOMER_CODE='') and EOSP.EOSP_ORDER_TYPE_CODE =:type) or (EOSP.EOSP_CUSTOMER_CODE =:customer and (EOSP.EOSP_ORDER_TYPE_CODE is null or EOSP.EOSP_ORDER_TYPE_CODE='')) or ((EOSP.EOSP_CUSTOMER_CODE is null or EOSP.EOSP_CUSTOMER_CODE='') and (EOSP.EOSP_ORDER_TYPE_CODE is null or EOSP.EOSP_ORDER_TYPE_CODE=''))) and EOSP.REC_STATUS = 0 <<and EOSP.ORG_ID = :orgId>> <<and EOSP.EOSP_AUTO_SPLIT = :autoSplit>> order by nvl(EOSP.EOSP_PRIORITY,0) desc
